gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin
Interface ITransformPlugIn

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageWatermark, TextWatermark
public interface ITransformPlugIn

Interface for post-extraction Image Transformation. Implementing classes are provided BufferedImages upon which they can apply watermarks or other manipulations for reasons of image security, provenance, etc.

Author:
Ryan Chute

Method Summary
 boolean isTransformable()
          Returns boolean indicator whether or not an image is transformable based on the global and instance properties.

Method Detail

setup

void setup(java.util.Properties props)
Initializes the implementation, overriding default values. Property keys are typically of the form ClassName.PropName. These are global instance fields.

Parameters:
props - Properties object containing implementation properties

setInstanceProps

void setInstanceProps(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> addProps)
Sets the instance properties, from which per dissemination changes can be based on.

Parameters:
addProps - HashMap object containing image transform instance properties

run

java.awt.image.BufferedImage run(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi)
                                 throws TransformException
Performs the transformation based on the provided global and instance properties.

Parameters:
bi - the extracted region BufferedImage to be transformed
Returns:
the resulting BufferedImage or the same bi if no changes are made
Throws:
TransformException

isTransformable

boolean isTransformable()
Returns boolean indicator whether or not an image is transformable based on the global and instance properties. This is very helpful for cache logic.

Returns:
true if transformable
